koinrobo.koinrobo-keyVisual-paragraphOne: Build smarter and diversified portfolio automagically with our innovative machine learning and earn predicted returns within the tenor of your choice while helping social commerce to grow at once.
koinrobo.koinrobo-statistic-paragraphOne: Automatically and safely allocate your fund only to real people, real businesses, and real purposes with verified and genuine data. In data and credibility we trust!
koinrobo.koinrobo-statistic-paragraphTwo: Using the Four Cs of banking standards, we make sure that your funding will only be allocated to those who have passed our tight credit assessment process.
koinrobo.koinrobo-statistic-paragraphThree: We are qualified to create, implement, analyze, monitor, maintain and document the Information Security Management System (ISMS) in terms of overall business risk.
koinrobo.koinrobo-features-descriptionOne: The rates that keep you aligned. Choose the fixed rates tailored to your appetite and with an automated system, just sit and relax! The fixed rate is yours.
koinrobo.koinrobo-features-descriptionTwo: Make every little koin works by contributing to lives, dreams, and go beyond by making social impacts for the better Indonesia. Invest in what matters.
koinrobo.koinrobo-features-descriptionThree: Automatically build smarter and diversified portfolio across the entire marketplace and earn predicted returns with our innovative technology.
koinrobo.koinrobo-features-descriptionFour: You can’t control time, but with KoinRobo, you can control the right time to get predicted returns with the tenor of your choice.
koinrobo.koinrobo-makingSocial-headingLabel: Change How You Lend, Change Lives
koinrobo.koinrobo-makingSocial-description: In addition to earning returns, your funding will be the transformative social impact to the community as it will be distributed to various social purposes.
koinrobo.koinrobo-invest-heading: Connect with Where Your Heart Belongs
koinrobo.koinrobo-invest-cardParagraphOne: Support local made products that make us proud to exceptionally increase the national economic growth.
koinrobo.koinrobo-invest-cardParagraphTwo: Unlock the high potential of female entrepreneurs. Your funding can power the advancement of all women.
koinrobo.koinrobo-invest-cardParagraphThree: Promising return by helping those who have proven the excellences in using your financing.
koinrobo.koinrobo-invest-cardParagraphFour: Your easiest way to keep supporting businesses who have made use of your funding perfectly to grow even more.
koinrobo.koinrobo-financialHero-heading: Be Engaged in What You Believe in
koinrobo.koinrobo-financialHero-paragraph: Join a community of Lenders who care and vote their fund to shape a better Indonesia. Listen to the inspiring stories of those who you have helped and get inspired to help them more. Achieve your financial dreams at once.
koinrobo.koinrobo-descriptionFour: Pick a social cause where your heart is and determine the loan duration (3, 6 or 12 months). The longer your choice, the higher the predicted and fixed rate you'll get.
koinrobo.koinrobo-descriptionSix: Explore your dashboard to know more about loan details, status, and repayment schedule at your fingertips via your own digital portfolio.
koinrobo.koinrobo-descriptionFive: All is good to go? Don’t forget to complete your order by clicking the Cart  button, and we will take care the rest by automatically diversifying your portfolio.
